plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

plugins.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly exports selected frame JSON data from Figma for other uses.

plugins.name: WEMS for Figma
plugins.description:
WEMS is a powerful platform that transforms your Figma prototypes into fully functional websites or mobile app view in just a few clicks. Designed for modern creators and product teams, WEMS allows you to:


  1. Convert Figma designs into responsive websites or mobile app view
  2. Optimize pages with built-in SEO tools for website
  3. Add translations for multilingual support
  4. Integrate Lottie and Rive animations
  5. Embed MP4 or other embeddable videos (Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, Twitch etc.)
  6. Support forms with inputs and data send to endpoint
  7. Integrate payment forms or buttons with own products
  8. Connect a custom domain
  9. Run A/B tests to experiment and improve
  10. Track performance with built-in analytics


With WEMS, you can go from design to deployment in record time — no coding required

plugins.name: Pinnaflow Collections
plugins.description:
Figma CMS Table Generator helps you structure CMS data directly in your Figma file, and export it as a Webflow-compatible CSV.


With this plugin, you can:


🗂 Create CMS Collections

Define fields with types like Plain Text, Rich Text, Image, Number, Date, or Switch — all directly in your Figma UI.


🧩 Add CMS Items

Populate data using a form-driven interface. Each item becomes a variant within your CMS component.


📤 Export CSV for Webflow

Download a ready-to-import CSV with your data structured according to Webflow CMS standards.


🎯 Apply CMS Data to Design

Inject field values into selected Figma elements by choosing collection, item, and field — no copy-pasting.


⚡ Real-Time Preview & Auto Validation

Live feedback lets you know when your component is ready for export, and disables the export button if any structure is invalid.


🖼 Responsive & Intuitive UI

A clean and responsive layout, with tooltips, modals, and auto-tab interactions for seamless workflow.


🛠 How to use:

Create a Collection

Go to the "Create Collection" tab → enter a collection name → define fields → click "Create Collection".


Add Items

Switch to "Create Item" → fill in values for each defined field → click "Create Item".


Export to CSV

Select the CMS component → click "Export CSV" in the Collection tab.


Apply Data to UI

In "Apply Data" tab → choose collection, item, and field → select a text layer in your design → click "Apply to Selected Element".


✅ Best Practices

Your CMS component must contain a frame named “CMS Properties”, with text layers in the format:

Field Name | Field Type


When applying data, make sure the selected element is a single text node.


Only one CMS component should be selected at a time when creating items or exporting.


Use consistent field names and valid types for clean CSV output and Webflow compatibility.
plugins.tagline: Create CMS collections in Figma and export them for Webflow import

137944.name: Pinnaflow Collections
137944.description:

When applying data, make sure the selected element is a single text node.


Only one CMS component should be selected at a time when creating items or exporting.

plugins.name: Text Flow
plugins.description:
「Text Flow」は、指定したレイヤー名のテキストに用意したテキストを流し込むプラグインです。これで、テキストのコピペ地獄とはサヨナラ！Figmaでのデザイン作業をスピードアップすることができます。


  1. レイヤー名の設定：テキストを入力したいレイヤーに、共通の名前をつけます。
  2. テキストの準備：流し込みたいテキストを、改行で区切って準備します。
  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。
  4. 入力と適用：レイヤー名とテキストを入力して、「適用」ボタンをクリックします。
plugins.tagline: テキスト流し込みを効率化

plugins.name: Color Combo
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin enables direct testing of color combinations in your design file. This allows the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō to be integrated into modern digital design processes without intermediate steps.


Steps

  1. Open the Color Combo plugin
  2. Select two color styles from the dropdown (or add new ones)
  3. Apply these color styles to your design elements (frames, text, etc.)
  4. Choose a color combination: Click any combination preview, or hit Random for instant variety Toggle Muted colors for subtle palettes
plugins.tagline: Bringing the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō (1883–1967) to your digital workflow.

plugins.name: Radix color palette
plugins.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

136337.name: Radix color palette
136337.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
136337.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

plugins.name: 혼용되는 외래어, 한자어 & 금용용어 사전
plugins.description:
혼용되는 외래어와 한자어, 어려운 금융 용어까지 한눈에!

이 서비스는 일상에서 자주 접하지만 정확히 알기 어려운 단어들을 쉽게 풀어주는 언어 가이드입니다.

단어의 출처, 의미, 바른 사용법은 물론, 대체 가능한 순우리말까지 함께 제공하여

더 정확하고 이해하기 쉬운 소통을 도와드립니다.


📘 외래어 vs 한자어 구분

💬 금융 용어 번역과 설명

🔍 혼동되는 표현 비교


언제나 쉽고, 누구나 알 수 있도록.

“이 단어, 정말 맞는 표현일까?” 고민될 땐, 지금 바로 검색하세요.


A guide to mixed foreign, Sino-Korean, and finance terms — all in one place.

This service helps you understand commonly used yet often confusing words with ease.

We offer origins, meanings, proper usage, and even alternative native Korean terms,

making communication clearer and more accurate.


📘 Distinguish foreign vs Sino-Korean terms

💬 Translate and simplify financial jargon

🔍 Compare confusing expressions side-by-side


Simple. Understandable. For everyone.

“Is this the right word to use?”

Just search and find out.

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.tagline: 낯선 단어, 친절한 해석 (Confusing Words, Clear Meanings)

plugins.name: Riido
plugins.description:
디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업


피그마와 뤼이도를 연동해 디자이너와 개발자의 작업 흐름을 자연스럽게 연결하세요.

디자이너는 더 이상 뤼이도에 직접 들어가 작업 상태를 수정할 필요 없이, 피그마에서 디자인 작업만 해도 자동으로 뤼이도에 최신 상태가 반영됩니다.

개발자는 언제 어떤 디자인이 완료되었는지 실시간으로 확인할 수 있어, 놓치지 않고 바로 개발을 시작할 수 있습니다.


주요 기능


🔗 Figma 디자인과 작업을 연결

작업과 연결된 프레임, 섹션, 페이지를 플러그인에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

연결된 작업을 클릭하면 해당 디자인으로 이동할 수 있어 맥락 파악이 쉬워집니다.


🔄 Figma에서 바로 작업 상태 업데이트

디자인이 완료되면, Figma 안에서 작업 상태를 ‘완료’로 변경할 수 있어 매번 뤼이도에 접속하지 않아도 됩니다.


🧭 작업 히스토리와 현재 상태 추적

플러그인 안에서 작업 목록, 상태, 담당자, 우선순위 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있어,

디자인과 개발 간에 엇갈림 없이 협업할 수 있습니다


뤼이도와 피그마의 유기적인 연결로

더 빠른 작업 전달, 더 적은 커뮤니케이션 비용, 더 집중된 업무를 경험해보세요.
plugins.tagline: 디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업

137893.name: Riido

디자이너는 더 이상 뤼이도에 직접 들어가 작업 상태를 수정할 필요 없이, 피그마에서 디자인 작업만 해도 자동으로 뤼이도에 최신 상태가 반영됩니다.

개발자는 언제 어떤 디자인이 완료되었는지 실시간으로 확인할 수 있어, 놓치지 않고 바로 개발을 시작할 수 있습니다.


주요 기능

작업과 연결된 프레임, 섹션, 페이지를 플러그인에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

연결된 작업을 클릭하면 해당 디자인으로 이동할 수 있어 맥락 파악이 쉬워집니다.


🔄 Figma에서 바로 작업 상태 업데이트

디자인이 완료되면, Figma 안에서 작업 상태를 ‘완료’로 변경할 수 있어 매번 뤼이도에 접속하지 않아도 됩니다.


🧭 작업 히스토리와 현재 상태 추적

플러그인 안에서 작업 목록, 상태, 담당자, 우선순위 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있어,

디자인과 개발 간에 엇갈림 없이 협업할 수 있습니다


뤼이도와 피그마의 유기적인 연결로

더 빠른 작업 전달, 더 적은 커뮤니케이션 비용, 더 집중된 업무를 경험해보세요.

plugins.name: Elemental
plugins.description:
Elemental lets you export images and copy color and shadow values in a single click—no need to set a layer to export, or break a color style to see the hex value. Elemental is built for those quick one-off moments when a developer needs an asset or another app is asking for your primary brand color.


What it does:

  1. Export one or more layers as images in your desired file type and size
  2. Copy the fill color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  3. Copy the stroke color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  4. Copy a layer's shadows in css format


How it works:

  1. Keep your Elemental panel handy
  2. Select a layer
  3. Click your desired export or copy button
plugins.tagline: Snag basic assets in a flash

plugins.name: Lokaliser
plugins.description:
Translate smarter, without the bloat.


Lokaliser.io is a lightweight, no-fuss translation management plugin built for lean teams who want to scale globally — without dealing with overwhelming tools.

With this plugin, you can:

🔗 Connect your Figma design to a Lokaliser project

🏷 Assign and manage translation keys right in your file

🔄 Sync keys to/from Lokaliser Cloud (Import / Export - Sync ↓ / Sync ↑)

📌 Keep your UI copy structured, ready for localization

No over-complicated workflows. No unused features. Just what your team needs to make product localization fast, collaborative, and clean.


→ Start your 14-day trial 

→ Manage your projects in Lokaliser Dashboard


💡 Perfect for designers, devs & product teams working on multilingual apps & webs. Built by a team who values clarity and simplicity — just like you.

accepted.name: Lokaliser.io
accepted.description: Lokaliser is a realistic, rapid, and affordable Translation Management System built for startups and growing teams who want to localize without enterprise bloat

plugins.tagline: Sync and manage your translation keys directly inside Figma.

plugins.name: Ethos
plugins.description:
Ethos offers a top-notch brand asset management software solution and tools to streamline and organize your digital assets effortlessly.

- Create and share your own custom brand showrooms as an interactive website and pdf, and showcase and maintain your branding best practices.

- Share your official brand copy, brand logos, brand colors, brand fonts, brand rules and custom brand sections.

- Deploy your brand voice and image correctly to activate your powerful brand position.

- Improve your existing brand copy to bring it to the next level with artificial intelligence.

- Make your brand more authentic and cohesive by generating expanded primary, secondary and monotone color palettes.

- Invite your team and clients to your official brand spaces, and enable collaboration on one or more brands at a time.


For any questions or feedback, feel free to ping us at team@yourethos.io

accepted.name: Ethos
accepted.description: Build, share, and grow your iconic brand with our complete AI-powered creative brand showroom. Visit https://www.yourethos.io/ for more. Free Figma widget.

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

133684.name: ComponentFiller AI
133684.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）

131244.name: Choiceform SVG Icons Exporter
131244.description: Helps designers and developers quickly edit and export SVG icons along with their metadata. This plugin is particularly useful for managing and maintaining icon libraries.
131244.release_notes:
- Updated version number in package.json.
- Improved batch tag addition and removal logic to handle multiple tags.
- Added a new PresetTagsSelector component for easier tag selection.
- Introduced auto-update functionality to automatically export selections when tags change.
- Refined UI styles for better layout and usability.
131244.tagline: Quickly edit and export SVG icons with metadata.

plugins.name: Background Manager
plugins.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
plugins.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

130561.name: Background Manager
130561.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
130561.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

plugins.name: Figma to osu!framework
plugins.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma elements into osu!framework snippets

129799.name: Figma to osu!framework
129799.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)
129799.tagline: Convert Figma elements into osu!framework snippets

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly
